title: Near VG-EX Set of Mecca T201s For Sale - Includes Cobb, Matty, Johnson, Lajoie, etc.
author: canjond

posts.post_title: Near VG-EX Set of Mecca T201s For Sale - Includes Cobb, Matty, Johnson, Lajoie, etc.
posts.post_content:
I am considereing selling a near set (38) of T201s.  The set grades a consisent VG, with some cards VG-EX.  All cards have wonderful eye appeal.  35 of the 38 are graded by either SGC or PSA.  A complete list of the cards and grades are below.

Some highlights include:

Nap Lajoie / Fred Falkenberg- PSA 6
Edgar Summers / Hugh Jennings - SGC 40
Christy Mathewson / Albert Bridwell - PSA 2.5
Walter Johnson / Gabby Street - PSA 2
Sam Crawford / Ty Cobb - SGC 40
John Evers / Frank Chance- SGC 40

Complete list of all cards:

Please feel free to email me for scans of any of the cards.  In terms of price, I'd be looking for around $2700.
